body: Hi, how can I change the color of simulation to black and white?[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/SNF651yU0cUVgww6dH*12Eznz5eBrjkyVb74FlFH5c8xomF73s9mc8*AoZTO0SjZQCbagJsgABnTgoam0BXpqjfFHHmwB3Ah/5.png)

replies.body: Use the legendPar and GradientLibrary from LB. Pick option 5 (sunlightHours) for B/W colors. -A. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/SNF651yU0cXpYgIc0NajrQfA6RXGyOonmOrdYpL5YGffQvxLxixSUIrXV1sI-pyIbm3*ikimPPxnAeFw8YPNwnxwA1Ihw2Rx/Canvasat174237.png)
